com.lowagie.text.pdf

Class PdfColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfObject
      • com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfArray
        • com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfColor

  •  class PdfColor
extends PdfArray
    A PdfColor defines a Color (it's a PdfArray containing 3 values).
    See Also:
    PdfDictionary
